About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I have over 4 years of experience working as an technical professional. I have built multiple scalable backend services. I love programming and solving problems with technology. I love building things and 'annoying' bugs during development is fun to tackle.

My provious role was Head of Product at Aingels Inc. where I spent most of my time in working with marketing team to define & develop "Aingels on guard" product specifications, managing and supervising both development and design team to deliver on expected time frame. In addtion, I was focused on translating real customer problem into a buisness justification.
